response.overview: Don Bluth is the visionary behind the films An American Tail, The Land Before Time, The Secret of NIMH, and Anastasia, as well as the video game Dragon's Lair. Weaving intimate conversations with hundreds of hours of never-before-seen archive and home video, Don Bluth: Somewhere Out draws a compelling portrait of an artist who spent his life battling his own ego and a career torn between art and commerce all in pursuit of fulfilling his dream.
response.title: Don Bluth: Somewhere Out There
